review: Used the Fire TV box for two weeks and the main reasons I selected this box over the Apple TV box have already been confirmed. The remote is great, extremely responsive and works no matter where you point it due to the Bluetooth connection. Also, the box is much faster loading and switching apps compared to the Apple TV box. I'm planning to buy 1-2 more for our other bedrooms.
author: Brian
